metric_description: Utilization target multiplied by number of serving VMs. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 180 seconds.
The sum of the utilization of a specified metric for all serving VMs. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 180 seconds.
The minimum number of VMs that the autoscaler recommends according to the scaling schedule. Sampled every 60 seconds. After sampling, data is not visible for up to 180 seconds.
